level.text: Violation of any of the following provisions shall be a Class 3 infraction:
IFC § 904.1 (extinguishing systems are not inspected and tagged);
IBC § 1003.2.10.2 or 12G DCMR § PM-702.6 (exit signs are not maintained or clearly illuminated at all times when the building is occupied); or

Any provision of the District of Columbia Construction Codes adopted pursuant to the Construction Codes Approval and Amendment Act of 1986, effective March 21, 1987 (D.C. Law 6-216; D.C. Official Code §§ 6-1401 et seq.) which is not cited elsewhere in this section shall be a Class 3 infraction.
